thread.section_title: DogVacay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DogVacay | dogvacay.com | 5 of 137
thread.title: Crystal Bush

author: Crystal Bush
title: Crystal Bush
text: I was hesitant about boarding my recently rescued shelter puppy in a kennel and came across this site. I was hesitant at first, but the background checks and information about the hosts made me give it a chance. I boarded with Tara who works for well-known vet for whom my first dog was a patient! It was a great experience and I will use her for my boarding needs in the future.
